AERCAP.COMGlobal Leader in Aviation
International Board
Paul Dacier
Non-Executive Vice Chairman, AerCap and General 
Counsel, Indigo Agriculture
33 years of corporate law experience and 10 years on 
aircraft leasing boards.
Pieter Korteweg
Non-Executive Chairman, AerCap
Extensive experience in investing and ﬁnancial services as 
well as in government and regulatory affairs.
Aengus Kelly
CEO, AerCap
20 years of aviation leasing and ﬁnancing experience, 
including more than a decade of experience at AerCap.
Salem Al Noaimi
Chairman, Waha Capital
Robust investment and management experience across 
industries, including in aircraft leasing.
Homaid Al Shimmari
CEO, Mubadala Aerospace & Engineering Services
Extensive executive management experience across the 
aerospace industry.
Richard (Michael) Gradon
Former Legal Dept. Group Head, Peninsular & Oriental Steam Navigator
Signiﬁcant legal and corporate governance experience, 
with 10 years on aircraft leasing boards.
James Lawrence
Former Chairman & CEO, Rothschild North America
Major corporate and board experience, including in the 
aviation industry.Signiﬁcant background in M&A and investment banking.
Robert Warden
Senior Managing Director at Cerberus Capital 
Management, L.P.
Over 22 years of ﬁnancial services and private equity 
experience.
Michael Walsh
Former Chief Legal Ofﬁcer, Bord Gais Eireann
Over 25 years’ experience as a non-executive director, senior 
executive and commercial lawyer in the aircraft leasing and ﬁnancing industry. 
Julian (Brad) Branch
Former Senior Advisor in the ofﬁce of the CEO, Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Ltd 
Signiﬁcant global ﬁnancial services and audit experience 
over a 40 year career in accounting practice, and includes a sector focus on air transportation.
